SummaryEnglish: For Chio Miyamo, just making it to school is a miracle! Whether it's construction sites, biker gangs, or the sudden call of nature, obstacles great and small stand in the path of our titular hero!

1.TitleEnglish: Because the School Is There / Chio-chan and Hosokawa-san
1.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan happily heads to school after spending the whole night gaming, but her usual route is blocked because of construction. Part B: Chio-chan wakes up much earlier than usual.

2.TitleEnglish: Bloody Butterfly Effect / Manana, Ootoro, and Me / Bump of Slave
2.SummaryEnglish: Part A: There are so many dangers on the way to school! Part B: Chio-chan heads to school with her childhood friend Manana. Part C: Chio-chan is heading to school one day when she sees both Manana and Yuki waiting for her.

3.TitleEnglish: Bloody Butterfly Effect 2 / The Kabaddic Four
3.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan wakes up earlier than usual and decides to walk through a park to get to school. Part B: Chio-chan and Manana have fun talking about the upcoming physical fitness test.

4.TitleEnglish: Smoke on the Sailor / Taking the Cherry Blossom in Your Hand / Manana's School Road
4.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Manana and Chio talk about what kind of situation they’d like to be in before they die. Part B: Chio and Manana discuss the career survey path they were given. Part C: Manana tells Chio how she would’ve dealt with her awkward meeting with Yuki.

5.SummaryEnglish: Part A: One summer day, Chio-chan is faced with the sudden urge to go to the bathroom. Part B: The disciplinary monitor of Samejima Academy’s student council, Shinozuka Momo, has feelings for Gotou-sensei.

6.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan is told by Yuki that the head of the Kabaddi Club, Kushitori, is missing. Part B: Chio-chan spent way too much time playing video games yet again and turns her commute into an imaginary route from a game.

7.TitleEnglish: Convenience Store Chio-chan / Chio-chan and the Duel / Remnants of That Day
7.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan heads to her usual convenience store. Part B: Eihira Private Girls’ Academy is a renowned school where only the richest girls go. Part C: Chio-chan and Manana run into an old lady who’s always sitting in front of a café, all alone.

8.TitleEnglish: Yuki-chan Doesn't Care / Chio Fisher / Momo-chan's Story
8.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan and Manana head to school with their popular friend, Yuki. Part B: Chio-chan tries to tell Manana about an exciting new game. Part C: Momo thinks back on how she became a member of the disciplinary committee.

9.TitleEnglish: Chio-chan Changes Her Image / Flat Cut
9.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Tests are an unavoidable part of a student's life. Part B: Chio-chan spots a water pipe and starts talking about it as if it were her ideal boyfriend, which makes Manana laugh.

10.TitleEnglish: Shinozuka-san, Sugar Content, and the Press Conference / Thousand Spring / Andou and George
10.SummaryEnglish: Part A: One day, Momo asks Chio-chan and Manana if they’d eat some sweets with her. Part B: Chio-chan is walking to school by herself when she spots the little girl she had a duel with before. Part C: Andou and George have a little adventure.

11.TitleEnglish: Chio in the Middle of the Night / Apocri!
11.SummaryEnglish: Part A: Chio-chan is busy gaming into the middle of the night again. Part B: Manana gets curious about whether she has body odor after watching a news program on TV, so she has Chio-chan smell her.

12.TitleEnglish: Just One Masterful Method / Yuki-chan Bares It All
12.SummaryEnglish: Part A: One day, Andou's little sister Chiharu ends up visiting Chio at her house. Part B: Yuki-chan does some e outlandish things at times, but the girls find out she actually spends most of her time naked at home.
